text:
This place have been a pleasant surprise, if you like herbal Flavored bak kut teh this place will be right for you.
They have been able to continue to maintain the standard on having flavorful bak kut teh without having hard and tough meat, the maintain their meat at the right softness and even a little crunch.
The place is well maintained and clean. Their service is very fast. One of the best herbal bak kut teh in Johor.

I like the tea, but the Bak Kut Teh taste very average barely any herbal flavour that I usually taste in other places...

Is either something wrong with my taste or something ðŸ˜¥
Enjoyed my afternoon bakut teh soup. The meat was tender . Soup was flavourful . Only the salted vegetable was very oily . Overall was good. Will visit again
Very expensive..food portion is like kids size..this is what we pack for pork soup for 17 dollar.. no customer in store during peak hour prove this point. Will regret if visit.
Don't think there's any herbal taste in the soup. (ps. Till now I'm still Covid -ve). Just purely salty, for all the dishes...
